title: Minecraft 每周新闻
txt_content:
本帖最后由 01186 于 2013-11-11 17:05 编辑 

外文名称:Minecraft Weekly News_ Minecon 2013 Joy, Notch Interviewed, New Employees & More!


翻译: 
Minecraft 美周新闻_Minecon 2013 欢乐(我感觉像人名英文是joy), notch 采访新员工和其他的!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3tzNhDF6tvg#t=64

http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XNjMzNjM1OTI4.html
